title: Images of Italy
brief_description: A tourist guide through Italy highlighting the major sights in the cities from the historic Palio horserace in Siena, the ancient jousting tournament in Arezzo, Mount Vesuvius, the Isle of Capri, a Milan fashion show and a visit to the Pope’s country residence outside Rome. This is a stylish portrayal of an ancient and fascinating country.
